name: MDS Data Sheets
desc: I collected IMDS material data with an accuracy of one-thousandth of a percent from international suppliers, ensuring high product quality. I collaborated with Volvo CE units in Sweden and France, as well as the MSK Matec branch in Slovakia, while improving material management processes and fostering international cooperation.
